item.title: Can anyone post on how to make a server?
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

1)download a source(can be done in the download section)
2)get WinRAR
3)extact it from your desk top
3)now you’ll have all these folders to update and sach
4)now go to the tut section and find usefull tuts to update your server
5)go to no-ip.com and get your no-ip/or use hamchi
6)click compile.bat and run your server
7)adviste your server in the advertisment section

here’s bit more information!

Read full topic
